vsParam:
[px]! I have a favor to ask of you!
Can you go with me to kill monsters!?

Wow, a request that may do harm, again?
What's going on, Marie?

Earlier experience has taught me that the quickest way to know
how people in this world use items is through close observation!
And I don't want to get scolded by Anise anymore.

Sounds like her scolding has cast a shadow on you!
How long had you been scolding her, Anise?

Not long, I think...
Not that long... Ho ho.

Uh! A-anyway! [px], show me
how you use the items.
I'd feel embarrassed being stared by others...

Great, thank you!
Take me with you when you go kill monsters, [px]!

Ha-ha, don't say that!
Take me with you when you go kill monsters, [px]!

Anytime...
What about Anise Sensei? Um... Is it OK with you?

Tagging along would give me a sense of relief
compared to letting Marie go kill monsters alone.

Hahahaha...
Sorry to trouble you, Anise Sensei...

Who's the sensei you are talking about... Anyway, let's make
the not-so-dangerous monsters nearby our targets.

Anise is really suitable to be a sensei.
Although she doesn't realize that...

Yeah... I'm so envious of her.
She's so calm and prudent at this age... Hahaha...
